svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - January 22 2022
January 22 2022

title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 22, 2022" date: "2022-01-22"
Eth News and Links
Mainnet execution layer
‚Ä¢ Latest core devs call video . Notes from Tim Beiko : Engine API spec to make executing a payload optional & auth proposal Testnets post
PoW switch off likely to be Goerli & Sepolia Discussion of potential EIPs for Shanghai upgrade: EIP2537 BLS precompile, EIP3540 EVM Object
Format, EIP3670 EOF code validation and EIP3860 limit & meter initcode
‚Ä¢ Engine API spec to make executing a payload optional & auth proposal
‚Ä¢ Testnets post PoW switch off likely to be Goerli & Sepolia
‚Ä¢ Discussion of potential EIPs for Shanghai upgrade: EIP2537 BLS precompile, EIP3540 EVM Object Format, EIP3670 EOF code validation and
EIP3860 limit & meter initcode
‚Ä¢ Erigon v2022.01.02 : simplified miner gas limit, trace_filter intersection mode and bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Besu v21.10.9 : bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Empirical analysis of EIP1559 : fee estimation is now easier, decreased gas price volatility between blocks, reduced user wait time and
MEV larger share of miner revenue due to burn
‚Ä¢ Flashbots research: parallel EVM , execute transactions with no storage conflicts at the same time and pre-load storage using optional
access lists
Proof of Stake consensus layer
‚Ä¢ Lighthouse v2.1.0 : performance improvements, 5-10x smaller slasher db, improved peer count stability and bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Vitalik‚Äôs secret non-single leader election proposal to avoid DoS attacks on proposer, use randao reveal hash to select, lowest hash
wins for conflicts
‚Ä¢ proto-EIP: beacon state root in EVM to support validator withdrawals
‚Ä¢ Insecura : long range attack versus weak subjectivity testing
PoW switch off
‚Ä¢ Goerli testnet shadow forked in PoW switch off test
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIP4675 : Multi-Fractional Non-Fungible Token Standard
Layer2
‚Ä¢ Connext Vector v0.1.0 live, transfer value between Layer 2s using state channels
‚Ä¢ Warp (Solidity to Cairo transpiler): first major release, write tests in Solidity
‚Ä¢ StarkNet Prover code license discussion
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Kwenta by Synthetix !
Kwenta enables traders to access real-world and derivative assets on-chain using the power of the Synthetix protocol.
Long or short popular synthetic cryptocurrencies, commodities, forex, and equities without the limits or compromises of a centralized
exchange.
You can now also use L2 Kwenta on Optimism for low gas fees and blazing fast transactions!
Decentralized Perpetual Futures coming soon.
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Forge (Foundry testing framework) starter guide [another one]
‚Ä¢ Forge replit , run Forge in the browser, vanilla setup
‚Ä¢ Ganache v7 : local blockchain (formerly ganache-cli), 30x faster forking, zero-config mainnet forking
‚Ä¢ Hardhat-Vyper v3.0.0 : compilation cache fixed, removed Docker dependency and supports compiling with multiple Vyper versions
‚Ä¢ MetaMask Flask : developer distribution for experimental features, first feature is Snaps to build and plugin APIs
‚Ä¢ ENS Offchain Resolver : starter-kit to resolve names using external services, ready for dev testing, first step for Layer 2/off-chain
resolution
‚Ä¢ Solidity functions cheaper with payable modifier , non-payable functions add 24 gas check that msg.value is zero
‚Ä¢ evm-codes : share code links from playground
‚Ä¢ VestedERC20 : ERC20 wrapped as ERC20 that vests linearly
‚Ä¢ TWAM : time weighted minting prices for ERC721
‚Ä¢ MoonCats deep dive into on-chain generative art NFTs using traits
‚Ä¢ ERC721 with on-mint generation from 7 traits using probabilities
‚Ä¢ Playpen : gas optimized staking pool contracts, supports ERC20 & ERC721
‚Ä¢ Web3UIKit : lightweight UI components
‚Ä¢ Dune Analytics resources to get started
‚Ä¢ Rinkeby social faucet is back!¬†Alchemy‚Äôs Rinkeby faucet requires no auth
Security
‚Ä¢ Multichain bridge vulnerability , 600 ETH exploited, revoke approvals
‚Ä¢ Float Protocol ~$1 million exploit , Uniswap V3 price oracle manipulated
‚Ä¢ Redacted token vulnerability , ~$3 million was at risk, funds rescued
‚Ä¢ Notional Finance post mortem , verification missed vulnerability due to logic error
‚Ä¢ Austin Williams: MasterChefV2 principal freezing and ransom attacks
‚Ä¢ Secureum contract auditing next bootcamp
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ Josh Stark & Evan Van Ness: Year in Ethereum 2021
‚Ä¢ Ethereum.org: 20 million visits last year, Q1 roadmap includes rebrand from ETH2
‚Ä¢ ETHGlobal: NFT Hack recap and finalists
Enterprise
‚Ä¢ Twitter adds hexagon NFT profile pics on iOS, requires paid Twitter Blue subscription (US, Canada, Australia & New Zealand), SVG not yet
supported
‚Ä¢ Bud Light changes Twitter profile pic to Noun NFT in deal to feature Noun glasses in a Super Bowl commercial
‚Ä¢ Adidas & Prada collaboration with Zach Lieberman on 3000 tile canvas NFT
‚Ä¢ Gucci & SUPERPLASTIC collaboration selling NFTs with ceramic sculptures
‚Ä¢ StockXVault : custodial NFTs of physical products stored at a StockX facility
Application layer
‚Ä¢ Curve and Instadapp live on Optimism
‚Ä¢ UMA protected tokens, shield underlying token from theft or loss
‚Ä¢ ShapeShift v2 : DeFi gateway
‚Ä¢ Argent zkSync wallet adds Aave via pooling
‚Ä¢ Themis live on mainnet, borrow and lend against Uniswap v3 LPs
‚Ä¢ Radicle Drips : stream funds to an address, split funds, sell memberships & subscriptions, collect from multiple streams with a single
transaction
‚Ä¢ Snapshot X : governance voting on StarkNet & execute transactions on mainnet, work in progress, permissioned from Q2, open access from
Q3
‚Ä¢ OpenGSN meta-transactions live on Optimism
‚Ä¢ Lit Protocol : access control for content, airdrops & interactive NFTs
‚Ä¢ Coinbase NFT working with MasterCard to allow credit card purchases
‚Ä¢ gem : NFT marketplace aggregator
‚Ä¢ NFTX Inventory Staking : staked floor NFTs receive share of vault fees
‚Ä¢ CryptoStats data metrics, use community created datasets or publish an adaptor
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ Ether Capital is hiring a üë©üèº‚Äçüíª DevOps Engineer üë®üèª‚Äçüíª to stake millions on Eth2
‚Ä¢ Kwenta seeks Frontend Engineer , Solidity Engineer & Marketing Lead
‚Ä¢ Nethermind 1-3 month internship program
‚Ä¢ Are you a p2p networking whiz? EF research hiring Networking Engineer
‚Ä¢ Geth team seeks Senior Technical Writer to redo the docs & take ownership
‚Ä¢ Certora seeks SR SW Eng , Security Res , Security Eng & Community Manager
Reach developers experienced with Ethereum.¬† $600 for four issues (~75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to abcoathup.eth on
mainnet, Arbitrum or Optimism.¬† Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ US Fed CBDC discussion paper [PDF], proposes privacy-protected, intermediated, widely transferable & identity-verified CBDC
‚Ä¢ Bank of Russia consultation paper proposes ban on mining & use of crypto
‚Ä¢ Spanish regulator to require 10 days notice of crypto ad campaigns
‚Ä¢ UK government plans for financial promotion regulations to cover crypto
‚Ä¢ Dharma acquired by OpenSea, Dharma wallet being sunset over 30 days
‚Ä¢ ETH inflation rate below that of BTC
General
‚Ä¢ Wallets that load centralized NFT metadata directly can be used to identify an IP address from an Ethereum address
‚Ä¢ Hyperstructures : concept of protocols that are unstoppable, free, valuable, expansive, permissionless, positive sum and credibly
neutral
‚Ä¢ Opera‚Äôs Crypto Browser with native wallet for Android, Windows & Mac, public beta
‚Ä¢ Crypto.com $34 million in unauthorized withdrawals from 483 accounts, users refunded, all users migrated to new 2FA infrastructure
‚Ä¢ UK government advertising campaign against end to end encryption
‚Ä¢ Intel deprecating SGX in desktop chips
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @evan_van_ness and @abcoathup to get most of the week‚Äôs news in
real time.
Permalink for this week‚Äôs issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-january-22-2022
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note (new/changes in bold ) :
‚Ä¢ Feb 15 - Apr 5 ‚Äì Cryptocurrency Class (virtual)
‚Ä¢ Feb 17 ‚Äì Schelling Point (Denver)
‚Ä¢ Feb 18-20 ‚Äì ETHDenver
‚Ä¢ Mar 14-17 ‚Äì Eth Rio
‚Ä¢ Mar 17-18 ‚Äì ETH Austin summit
‚Ä¢ Mar 29-31 ‚Äì ETHDubai
‚Ä¢ Apr 7-9 ‚Äì ETH Portland hackathon
‚Ä¢ Apr 20-21 ‚Äì The Alliance gaming summit (Amsterdam)
‚Ä¢ Apr 21 ‚Äì ETHconomics (Amsterdam)
‚Ä¢ Apr 22-24 ‚Äì ETHAmsterdam
‚Ä¢ May 3-8 ‚Äì spaghettETH (Milan)
‚Ä¢ May 20 ‚Äì US Fed CBDC discussion paper feedback deadline
‚Ä¢ Jun 10-12 ‚Äì ETHPrague
‚Ä¢ Jun 16-19 ‚Äì ETH Miami summit & hackathon
‚Ä¢ Jun 20-23 ‚Äì NFT.NYC
‚Ä¢ Jun 24-26 ‚Äì ETHNewYork
‚Ä¢ Jul 8 ‚Äì ETH Seattle summit
‚Ä¢ Jul 19-21 ‚Äì EthCC 5 (Paris)
‚Ä¢ Aug 19-21 ‚Äì ETHMexicoCity
‚Ä¢ Aug 27-28 ‚Äì DeFi Security Summit (Stanford)
‚Ä¢ Aug 29-31 ‚Äì Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford)
‚Ä¢ Nov 4-6 ‚Äì ETHSanFrancisco
‚Ä¢ Dec 2-4 ‚Äì ETHTaipei
